field.name: UpcEanConv
field.label: UPC/EAN Conversion
field.help: UPC Codes can be converted to EAN by prefixing them with a zero. This setting determines if a UPC/EAN barcode should be automatically converted in one way or another when trying to match a rule with the other encoding.
